title: map for mods
body:
I think it will be a great idea if u guys put a new map in league for mods only every month put i new mode  that is all .
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

replies.body:
Help & Support isn't the best place for suggestions. These types of posts are better suited for the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), where suggestions and ideas often get posted. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
